cells.data:
## Purpose

Isolating insert for gibson assembly from the montium species.

## Samples

primers:
ruf_gibson_F1_cm ccagatccaggtcgcagcGTTACCCGGTACTGCATAACA
ruf_gibson_R1_cm tggcaataagtaccgtagAGTTGCTGGGACTTAATTTGA

2.) D. bocki
3.) D. jambulina
4.) D. melanogastor
5.) D. rufa
6.) D. bocki
7.) D. jambulina
8.) D. melanogastor
9.) D. rufa
 
* the reason it starts as #2 is because I accidently added bocki to postiotion 1 and 2, so I omitted 1.  I kept the original numbering to not confuse myself in the tube positions. 


## Program

Samples 2-9

step	temp	time
1	95	30 sec
2	95	15 sec
3	69	1 min
4	72	2 min
5	72	1 min
6	4	hold

Cycles = 29
